DESCRIPTION.HOW_DOES_IT_WORK: What should we drink saves you from the indecision of life! Each time you access the site you will find yourself with 8 different drinks, chosen randomly. You can search by name or even select the ingredients you prefer for a more specific search. Please don't stress and enjoy the evening!
DESCRIPTION.WHO_WE_ARE: Hi we are two young developers who have fun beyond work!
